definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full

sentences.english: Other plants can't do without tanking up loads of sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 其它的植物就非得饱尝充足的阳光。

sentences.english: I started to realize that it's the field that I have the most experience in.
sentences.chinese: 我开始发觉这是我经验最充足的一行。

sentences.english: There was adequate snow last winter.
Holidays are often absurdly generous, but the real issue is pensions.
sentences.chinese: 假期经常充足到荒谬，但真正的问题在于养老金。

sentences.english: There was already more than enough femininity in his life.
sentences.chinese: 他的生命已经具备了够充足的女性成份。

sentences.english: Our production brigade has set aside ample reserve grain.
sentences.chinese: 生产大队留出了充足的储备粮。

sentences.english: The government has sufficient stockpiles of staples such as wheat and rice.
sentences.chinese: 印度政府的主食储存，包括小麦和稻米，都很充足。

sentences.english: Give yourself enough time to select the best wedding dress for your Montpelier wedding.
sentences.chinese: 要让自己有充足的时间去选择最适合自己的结婚礼服。

sentences.english: I can use all kinds of translative tools (Trados). I am a professional, so I have enough time to work.
sentences.chinese: 我是一名自由职业者，日常工作日均有充足空闲时间。

sentences.english: There eis plenty of time for this emotional hand-off.
sentences.chinese: 人类有充足的时间进行这种情感的传递。

sentences.english: Red wolves may eat 2 to 5 pounds of food per day when prey is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 红狼在食物充足的时候每天要吃2到5英镑食物。

sentences.english: So we have transport facilities, labor force, preferential polities as well as abundant raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 原材料充足，劳动资源丰富，交通便利，政策优惠。

sentences.english: One category has comparatively adequate farm implements and some funds.
sentences.chinese: 一部分贫农有比较充足的农具和相当数量的资金。

sentences.english: But if you do not have full sun, there are other options.
sentences.chinese: 但如果不具备充足日照，也还有其他选择。

sentences.english: A horse takes them on errands, and a kitchen garden helps keep them well fed.
sentences.chinese: 马帮他们跑腿，厨房菜园使他们健康而营养充足。

sentences.english: Adequate rest is a largely ignored component of most athlete's training programs.
sentences.chinese: 充足的休息是被大多数体育训练计划忽视的一个部分。

definition: guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
to furnish/to provide/supply (as in supply and demand)
